title: Overlay chatroom category tags inside lobby thumbnails (bottom-right)

requirements.text: Update the lobby chatroom cards so that each chatroomâ€™s category tag is rendered as an overlay inside the thumbnail, positioned at the bottom-right corner of the thumbnail image area (instead of next to the title under the thumbnail).

quotes: can you place the category tags inside the actual thumbnails in the bottom right of them. do you know what i mean?

acceptanceCriteria: In the lobby grid, for any chatroom with a non-empty category, the category tag appears inside the thumbnail area as a bottom-right overlay.
The category tag no longer renders next to the chatroom title under the thumbnail.
The overlay tag remains legible over bright/dark thumbnails (e.g., via background scrim/opacity and appropriate text styling).
The overlay tag does not overlap the existing LIVE badge (LIVE stays top-left; category stays bottom-right).
Chatroom cards without a category render no category tag overlay and the layout does not shift unexpectedly.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/components/ui/* and specified hooks/main entry points) must not be edited; compose existing UI components instead.
Do not introduce any backend changes or schema/state migrations for this UI-only change.
nonGoals: Changing how categories are created, stored, filtered, or searched.
Changing the LIVE indicator design/placement beyond avoiding overlap with the category overlay.
Adding new categories or modifying the existing category list.
